about_the_game:
Baluno is a roguelike deckbuilder where you attempt to stack cards based either suit or value.

Discover unique Wildcards in order to create various synergies and bend the rules of the game to your will, unlocking outrageous score totals!

Please keep in mind that this is not going to be game of the year, it was just a fun little hobby project. But I can offer you a couple hours of fun in exchange for less than a coffee!

Feel free to reach out to me if you have any feedback, inquiries, or encounter issues with the game!

Gameplay
  • You start with a basic deck of cards, with values between 1-8 across 4 suits.
  • Add to your score by stacking cards with either the same value or same suit.
  • Upgrade the cards in your deck to increase the score your cards provide, or make it easier to stack them.
  • Discover Wildcards that completely break the rules of the game, enabling new combos and high scores.

name: Baluno

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Dual Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Baluno is a roguelike deckbuilder where you build stacks of cards in combinations of suits and numbers. Discover unique Wildcards in order to create various synergies and bend the rules of the game to your will, unlocking outrageous score totals!
